So we‚Äôre not only watching a fantasy about people with powers. We‚Äôre watching a fantasy where white people are treated the same as Black and Brown people by a system built for THEM. #Code8Movie

The excuse is usually ‚Äúthis makes the story more universal,‚Äù but what really happens is any character of color in the story ends up taking a backseat in a narrative that, in the real world, disproportionately affects them. #Code8Movie

Watching #Code8Movie which has a great premise and a topical world built in. But the world falls flat because it centers a white male lead that wouldn‚Äôt normally be affected by the discrimination they face in the movie. Way too many fantasy stories go that route it‚Äôs annoying.
